replies.body: Full chat logs? It's really hard to help from only those lines.
Post the entire chat log.

If there is no hate speech, racism, or death threats in your logs then create a support ticket requesting a second look at your case. The things I listed will jump you multiple punishment tiers depending on severity.

If you would like help identifying what in your logs caused your punishment to avoid this in the future post your full logs here and I or someone else can help you with that.
